name: Hello, World.
description: Complete quests for the creatures of this world to unlock items, buildings and perks for your village. Control your villagers' resources, happiness and whereabouts while exploring this odd land with its quirky stories.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 8 GB available space
